note: Specialized runner - see extra_data for details

vulnerability_location.description: The for-loop in commitDividend iterates from the user’s last processed dividend period up to the current dividendPeriod without a hard bound. If dividendPeriod grows large, this loop can exhaust gas and cause any call invoking commitDividend (e.g., transfer, transferFrom, invest, play, fallback) to revert, resulting in a denial of service.
Using block.blockhash(player.blockNum) as the source of randomness to determine lottery outcome
Missing payload length check in approve(address,uint) allows a short address attack on the spender or value parameter
Floating pragma `^0.4.13` allows the code to be compiled with any 0.4.x compiler (<0.5.0), leading to inconsistent behavior across compiler versions
